name: Secret Memer Burger
description:
scariest game ever made

you can either host your own game or join the main server (may be down in the future)

Keybinds

SEEKER ONLY

Z - Turn off facility lights

X - Give everyone a little spook

C - Close every door in the facility

all of these have cooldowns btw

--

Tab - Inventory

W A S D - Move

Click || E - Interact
